channel.title: Need help! ploxerz!
channel.description:
ok i dont know how to do this even you know and can tell me that would be great ;D
when your in wild if your a lower lvl and ur atting a higher lvl you have to right click
how do i change it so attack is on top so you can just click on them?
help plz :eek:
EDIT: HOW DO YOU LOCK YOUR SERVER SO THERE CAN ONLY BE LIKE 20 PLAYERS?
if you can answer any of them thx :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 04:33:46 PM[/size][hr]sry for double posting but i really need to know!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Need help! ploxerz!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("ipbanuser")) { appendToBannedIP(victim); String victim = command.substring(10); //or 11? }

Just rewrite the right click things like it is with the playerRights(for kicks)

If I had a server, or have looked at one in the past 3 months, I could do this with ease.
But, I havn’t.
